#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
= key =
  * {c} = Class
  * {\*} = Instance of a class
  * {f} = Function
  * {o} = Object Literal
  * [a] = Array
  * (n) = Number (any kind)
  * <c> = Constant, a value to be considered read only to you
  * {e} = Javascript Event Object
